Name: Amsterdam Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Orange-yellow in flavour with genever adding a pleasant spiritous bready backbone to orange fruit. Perhaps serve with marmalade on toast for breakfast.
History: Adapted from Hyma Gale and Gerald F. Marco's 1937 book The How and When .
Nutrition: One serving of Amsterdam Cocktail contains 134 calories
